cause.description:
LOOKING FOR A SAFE STANCE ON ABORTION? ME NEITHER.
REGRESSIVE PARTY: Against Abortion, For Killing Babies.
We honor Maddox's incredible thinking about abortion.
WHich is basically to piss everyone off instead of everyone getting their way.
Beautiful, isn't it?
This group is not intended to be a joke. Of course the title of this page, stolen from Maddox, is an exaggeration of our beliefs, but our principles remain the same: people bitch too much about abortion. SHUT UP!
1. Abortion is Over-Debated
2. Everyone should shut up
3. Maddox is god
cause.mission: get people to shut up about abortion.
cause.name: Regressive Party
